name: Former arena medic turned tavernkeeper; practical, sharp-eyed, and trusted by locals.
one_line: Mid-40s human woman with cropped dark hair streaked with silver, wearing rolled sleeves, an apron, and a copper lantern pin. A faint scar runs from temple to jaw.
physical: Warm but no-nonsense, perceptive, remembers faces and favors; quiet authority.
personality: Maris served fifteen years as a field medic in the lower-tier arenas before retiring after a near-fatal gate malfunction. She co-founded The Copper Lantern to create a safe space for workers and competitors and maintains contacts among arena staff and medics.

name: The Copper Lantern’s resident bookmaker — charming, fast-talking, and never far from his ledger.
one_line: Wiry human in his 30s with neatly kept hair, ink-stained fingers, and a perpetual half-smile. Wears a short vest lined with pocket charms for luck and a thumb-ring carved from arena stone.
physical: Smooth, calculating, but genuinely enjoys the excitement of the matches. Known for fair odds and quiet discretion.
personality: Tarn was once an assistant oddskeeper for a major Arena syndicate before a scandal sent him into self-imposed exile. Maris gave him a second chance — now he manages wagers for The Copper Lantern, keeping things clean but never dull.
